p: Total RNA was extracted with a TRIzol reagent (Invitrogen). The cDNA was reverse transcribed with a High-Capacity cDNA Reverse Transcription kit (Roche) and oligo d(T)18 primers. The RT-PCR was carried out on Mx3005P (Agilent Technologies, Stratagene, USA) using the Power SYBR® Green PCR Master Mix (2x) (ABI). The amplification procedure was as follows: initial activation at 95°C for 2 min, followed by 45 cycles of 95°C for 15 s, 57°C for 15 s, and 68°C for 20 s. The primers used in this study are listed in Table 1. Data were normalized to the housekeeping GAPDH gene, and the relative abundance of the transcripts was calculated using Ct methods.
